Conversation¶

class simulate.conversation.Conversation(conf: any, speaker: Agent, random: dict, agents: list[Agent])¶

Bases: object

Represents a conversation between agents, managing the dialogue and interactions.

conf¶

Configuration settings for the conversation. Passed as arg to avoid loading again.

Type:

any

speaker¶

The agent initiating the conversation.

Type:

Agent

random¶

Random values for managing conversation dynamics.

Type:

dict

agents¶

List of all agents participating in the conversation.

Type:

list[Agent]

setting¶

The type of conversation setting (e.g., one-to-one).

Type:

str

listeners¶

Selected listeners for the conversation.

Type:

dict

topic¶

The topic of conversation.

Type:

str

initiate_conversation()¶

Initializes the conversation by selecting its setting, listeners, and topic.

pick_listeners()¶

Chooses the listeners for the conversation based on the selected setting.

pick_setting()¶

Selects the conversation setting based on the speaker’s preferences.

pick_topic()¶

Selects the topic of conversation based on the speaker’s preferences.

run_conversation_protocol()¶

Executes the conversation protocol, managing message exchanges between agents (sending, receiving, updating).

Returns:

The attributes of all participating agents that changed during the simulation.

Return type:

dict

save_state()¶

Saves the state of the conversation based on the current setting.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the attributes of all participating agents that changed during the simulation.

Return type:

dict
